Articles.Content:
I have done many Slightly elliptical orbits of Kerbin and the contract still is not working. I am only using visual mods that to not effect gameplay.

 

I am too dumb to upload an image

Upload your screenshot to a sharing service and copy the link they provide here. 

So are you visually matching your path to the contract path?
Check if the orbit should be retrograde

Copy over, from both the craft and the contract, the following:

Apoapsis, Periapsis, Inclination, Longitude of the Ascending Node.

Those define the orbit, and should make it immediately apparent what the problem is.
